item.title: 29 Jan 2019 Update
item.description: What changed? All file names that are created new now have _ where special characters should be, but the title remains the same You have now the ability to select more repositories to publish to. Previously you had the ability to select the first 30, now it’s the first 100. More will follow later (We’re thinking infinite) That’s it for today, not much, but important for our users.

item.title: 27 Jan 2019 Update
item.description: As part of the End of January Update for Doxti.com, there where a few changes made for this update to our service, to provide a better experience for our current and future users. Here is a list of changes, explained Aesthetic Changes Removed datepicker from login forn - all we wanted is to make sure that the people registering are not underage for the internet Red Warning text on download page, not so scary anymore - we listened to feedback and the text on the download page was scary, because it was red and big enough to intimidate.

item.title: First Post!
item.description: But not just any post This post was created using https://doxti.com and is the first post for the tech blogging of doxti.tech. Of course, this first post is not going to be techie. But it is going to say something. Doxti SRL is a small fresh company from Cluj Napoca. It’s main product right now, is https://doxti.com, which is a static site generator User interface. Basically it’s a Admin Panel for HUGO from http://gohugo.
